amendment.description: To impose a limitation on the use of sums appropriated for the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1818 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 385.
Amendment SA 1818 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S12350; text: CR S12350) To impose a limitation on the use of sums appropriated for the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1818 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 385.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1818 proposed by Senator Byrd.
